about_the_game:
The once beautiful world of Erotis suffers from a goblin invasion. The vile creatures have destroyed all life and enslaved all the beauties. Only a small group of old elven priestesses remain free. They decide to call upon a hero to save their world and free their people. After conducting a secret ritual, the priestesses establish a connection with their god and ask him for help. An ancient entity intercepts the soul of a girl named Eli who accidentally died and revives her in a dying world.

The god makes a contract with the girl to kill the goblin lord. If she fulfills her part of the deal, he will return her home. As a reward, she also receives magical powers and the gift of immortality. If she is killed, she will be reborn again until the contract is fulfilled.

The game is made in the roguelike genre. You have to go into the dungeon and fight enemies, collecting and combining spells. After death, you will improve your base, opening new spells and items, increasing your chances of survival.

You will find:

  • A large number of enemies with their own abilities and behavior patterns

  • Unique sex scenes with each enemy consisting of several acts. The ability to cum inside and outside.

  • XRAY in sex scenes

  • 5 schools of magic and a large number of spells.

  • Unique positive and negative effects

  • The ability to develop your base and upgrade your character

  • Interesting and fun random events in the dungeon

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Goblin Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: The once beautiful world of Erotis is suffering from a goblin invasion. The vile creatures have destroyed all life and enslaved all the beauties. Only a small group of old elven priestesses remain free. They decide to summon a hero.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
